ValidationRule.description: validate that is there a markup the value has to be filled, for now is just for APAC Countries.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'FP_Account', NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ), AND(NOT ( ISPICKVAL(Mark_up__c, 'No mark-up')), NOT( ISPICKVAL(Mark_up__c, '')), OR(ISBLANK(Mark_up_Value__c),NOT(Mark_up_Value__c>0)) ) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The mark up value can't be blank or 0
